Plot: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a US Marshall he has kidnapped.
Title: Out of Sight
Actors: George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Jim Robinson, Mike Malone
tomatoConsensus: Steven Soderbergh's intelligently crafted adaptation of the Elmore Leonard novel is witty, sexy, suprisingly entertaining, and a star-making turn for George Clooney.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 13 wins & 12 nominations.
